name: Rescue Time (SJ Games - NES)
description:
Rescue Time is the small NES game demo from SJ Games (a 8 years old french kid) made in the context of the NESmaker Byte Off Competition 2020.

STORY:

Joe was sent into the past via a time machine designed by Austin.
Unable to repair his machine to bring back his friend, Austin will also send SJ back in time to save Joe.

CONTROLS:

"Left/Right" directional buttons to move left/right
"Start" on the title screen to start the game
"Start" on a 2020 levels to warp in 1989 (when enough nes carts)
"A" button to jump
"B" button to talk to a NPC

CREDITS:

Created by SJ Games 
NESmaker software (by Joe Granato of The New 8bit Heroes)
